for a house of R.C.C. roof terrace house, situated at Door No. 6-70, worth Rs. 12,57,000/- (literally twelve lakhs and fifty seven thousand rupees).

OF-2-
You are my fellow-sister. Out of the great love I have for you, I, with the intention of giving you some immovable property free of charge and without any consideration from you, do hereby submit to you the following schedule of my ancestral property, which is the property of Polekurru village, Taluk Survey No. I have constructed a R.C.C. roof terrace house with a plot of land measuring 137.24 sq m or 114.75 sq m in the area of 228 1 with my own money. The said property is registered in my name in the records of the Gram Panchayat and I am enjoying the possession and enjoyment of the said property with full rights and privileges, paying all the Gram Panchayat taxes in my name. The said property is hereby transferred to you free of charge without any consideration from you. I have taken physical possession of the said property on this day itself as per the schedule. Therefore, from now on, you shall have all the full rights of donation and sale in the property as per the schedule, and shall pay all taxes, and shall enjoy the happiness of your son and grandson for the rest of their lives.
Therefore, in this regard, regardless of any disputes arising from any feud or any other cause, I, my heirs, or any other person, shall be able to discharge all such liabilities at our own expense and execute the property to you or your heirs without any interruption according to this deed.
If you need any amendment documents, supplemental documents, etc., to make the title to the Scheduled Property effective, I can provide you with the deeds, duly registered in your name, as soon as you request. I hereby declare to you, and in my opinion, that the property as per Schedule is a free and undisputed property, free from all gifts, purchases, agreements, mortgages, guarantees, etc., and that there is no other heir, beneficiary or partner to the property except me, and that the survey number, title, limits, boundaries etc. are correct, and that I have been informed and convinced of this and have given you this settlement deed in your name on this day. I hereby file the covenants for the registration of the property as per Schedule. The Scheduled Property is not an Assigned Property under A.P. Act No. 9/1977. Photocopies of all records relating to the above mentioned property are hereby furnished to you as vouchers. Attacks

Declaration of the undersigned
I have furnished all the necessary details like title deeds, tax receipts and government issued identity documents of my own to the undersigned. I hereby declare that I have not made any transfer, alienation/registration of the property in this deed to anyone before and that no one else has any right to transfer the said property except me.
The Sub-Registrar, his office staff and the draftsman shall not be held responsible or liable for the document written and registered on this day. The document has been prepared and registered with the details furnished by me. I hereby declare that I will, if necessary, register and submit any amendment/agreement/supplementary documents to the undersigned without any delay and without any compensation. I hereby declare that all the information given by me is true and that if any of the information given by me is found to be false in the future, I shall be fully responsible for all legal actions and transactions related to such matters. 

Declaration of the undersigned I have personally inspected and shown to experts all the necessary details such as the title deeds, the certificate of conformity and the identity documents of the undersigned and have verified the truth of the said information and have got this document registered by the undersigned. Therefore, I hereby declare that I shall be fully responsible for all transactions related to this property.

The Sub-Registrar, his office staff and the draftsman shall have no connection or liability in respect of this document prepared and registered on this day. The document has been prepared and registered on the basis of the particulars furnished by me. Dadala Subbalakshmi Nishan Sheet Endorsement

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 437 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Dadala Arjunarao, in favour of his Wife, Dadala Subbalakshmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 137.24 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 6-70, comprised in survey number 228-1, situated in Polekurru village and Grama Panchayath, Thallarevu Mandal, Erstwhile East Godavari, now within the District of Kakinada, registered at sub-registrar office Tallarevu (412) is bounded as follows: North by: 37.3 Fts., Or 11.35 Mts., Site, House of Dunna Nookaratnam South by: 37.3 Fts., Or 11.35 Mts., Site, House of Nalli Parvathi East by: 33.2 Fts., Or 10.10 Mts., Panchayathi Road West by: 33.2 Fts., Or 10.10 Mts., Site, House of Dadala Suribabu.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
